meanings.definition: Capable of absorbing moisture or liquid.
meanings.sent2: The paper towel is absorbent and soaks up spills quickly.
meanings.sent3: The thirsty plant drank up all the water like an absorbent sponge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an absorbent sponge, soaking in all the information.
meanings.sent5: The desert sand was not absorbent, letting the rain quickly disappear.

meanings.definition: A material or substance that absorbs moisture or liquid.
meanings.sent1: She used an absorbent to clean up the spill.
meanings.sent2: The diaper had a layer of absorbent material to keep the baby dry.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen sponge, an absorbent, was always ready to clean up messes.
meanings.sent4: The absorbent in the paper towel worked like magic, soaking up the juice.
meanings.sent5: The absorbent in the soil helped the plants grow by holding onto water.
